job_tasks.phrase: passie over Machine Learning en wil je deze toepassen
job_tasks.justification: The phrase indicates a desire to actively use and apply machine learning knowledge.
The job title itself explicitly states the role is focused on MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: implementeren en onderhouden van onze machine learning infrastructuur en workflows
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the core responsibilities of MLOps, focusing on infrastructure and workflows.

job_tasks.phrase: samenwerken met onze data scientists, Natural Language Processing (NLP) specialisten en software engineers
job_tasks.justification: Collaboration with software engineers suggests involvement in the software development lifecycle for AI products.

job_tasks.phrase: naadloze overgang van ontwikkeling naar productie te waarborgen
job_tasks.justification: Ensuring a smooth transition from development to production is a key aspect of software development and deployment for AI models.
The mention of 'generative AI' indicates a focus on creating or working with generative models.

job_tasks.phrase: bouwen van de meest effectieve en schaalbare machine learning systemen
job_tasks.justification: Building ML systems implies modeling and the engineering around it.

soft_skills.phrase: Je stelt je open voor nieuwe technologieën en aanpakken
je werk je nauw samen met onze data scientists, Natural Language Processing (NLP) specialisten en software engineers

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes MLOps, infrastructure, and workflows for machine learning systems, including a focus on generative AI. While there's mention of collaboration with NLP specialists, the core responsibility is the implementation and maintenance of ML infrastructure and systems, aligning most closely with the MLOps aspects of the ML Engineer profile.
